definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Texture a watercolor sky when the paint is still wet.
sentences.chinese: 纹理水彩颜料时，天空仍是湿的。

sentences.english: She opened her never-before-used set of watercolours and set to work.
sentences.chinese: 她打开自己从未用过的水彩画工具，开始认真画画。

sentences.english: Cardboard boxes for the tenements, doors and windows painstankingly detailed with coloured pens.
sentences.chinese: 用水彩笔描绘的纸板箱是用来装公寓，大门和窗户的。

sentences.english: The second part of this paper mainly discussed Lhe aesthetic education of watercolor.
sentences.chinese: 文章的第二部分主要论述的是水彩艺术的审美与教学。

sentences.english: Learn how to paint trees with watercolor paints in this free art lesson video.
sentences.chinese: 学习如何用水彩颜料画在这个自由艺术课视频树木。

sentences.english: Use watercolor paints to touch up Polaroid transfers.
sentences.chinese: 使用水彩颜料来润色宝丽来转移。

sentences.english: Painting with watercolors is quite different from painting with oils, for example.
sentences.chinese: 举例来说，水彩画和油画有很大不同。

sentences.english: A dry brush technique in watercolor painting uses very little water.
sentences.chinese: 阿干在水彩画技法使用非常少的水。

sentences.english: Is it a picture of watercolour?
Learn how to watercolor splatter paint in this free art lesson video.
sentences.chinese: 了解如何水彩颜料飞溅在这个自由的艺术课视频。

sentences.english: The artist painted in water colors.
If any one medium cries for the broken color approach, this is it.
sentences.chinese: 水彩是一种需要处理复色的颜料。

sentences.english: Watercolor paint can be used to color drawings or by itself.
sentences.chinese: 水彩颜料可以用来为图画涂色，或者直接用来绘画。

sentences.english: It was to be a whole-length in water-colours, like mr.
sentences.chinese: 应该是全身水彩画像，就像奈特里先生的那幅一样。

sentences.english: Like watercolor, the quality of the working surface is critical.
sentences.chinese: 像水彩，画纸的质量是关键。

definition: gongbi, traditional Chinese painting method characterized by meticulous brush technique and detailed description
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
to sketch from nature/to do a still life drawing
